subject: how to write run method in testcase?
msgSnippet: Hi! All, im getting follwing problem, when im trying to implement following code. . . . . public class basicTest extends AbstractTestCase implements Runnable{
messageBody:
Hi! All,

im getting follwing problem,
when im trying to implement following code. . . . .

public class basicTest extends AbstractTestCase implements Runnable{

......
.
}
the AbstractTestCase extends the TestCase class..

The error show in eclipse is:
" The return type is incompatible with Runnable.run(), TestCase.run
()"
i know 'TestCase' class contains run() method, and 'Runnable'
interface contains run() method.

i don't know how junit supports mutithreading?

Thanks in advance
chandrashekhar
